  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bios_es_20070518_3_0031000</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bios_es_20070518_3_0031000</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Biotecnología</string>
            <string language="en">Biotechnology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biotechnologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biotechnologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biotechnology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biotecnologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βιοτεχνολογία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Tema que trata sobre las aplicaciones de los conocimientos biológicos para la obtención de beneficios agrícolas, ganaderos, alimentarios o médicos. Explica con detalle los procesos de clonación utilizados en ingeniería genética.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic dealing with the applications of biological knowledge to obtain benefits from agriculture, animal raising, the food industry and medicine. It explains in detail the cloning process used in genetic engineering.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Biotecnología</string>
            <string language="en">Biotechnology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das die Anwendungen des biologischen 
Wissens beschäftigt, um Nutzen von der Landwirtschaft, vom 
Tieranheben, von der Lebensmittelindustrie und von der Medizin zu 
erreichen. Es erklärt im Detail den Klonenprozeß, der in der 
genetischen Technik verwendet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet traitant les applications de la 
connaissance biologique pour obtenir des avantages d'agriculture, 
d'augmenter animal, de l'industrie alimentaire et de médecine. 
Il explique en détail le processus de clonage utilisé dans la 
génétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que trata das aplicações do 
conhecimento biológico para obter benefícios da agricultura, do 
levantamento animal, da indústria de alimento e da medicina. 
Explica em detalhe o processo do cloning usado na engenharia 
genetic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che si occupa delle applicazioni di 
conoscenza biologica per ottenere i benefici da agricoltura, 
dall'allevamento animale, dall'industria alimentare e dalla medicina. 
Spiega dettagliatamente il processo della clonazione usato 
nell'ingegneria genetica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξετάζει τις εφαρμογές της βιολογικής γνώσης
για να ληφθούν τα οφέλη από τη γεωργία, το ζώο που αυξάνουν, η 
βιομηχανία τροφίμων και η ιατρική. Εξηγεί λεπτομερώς τη 
διαδικασία κλωνοποίησης που χρησιμοποιείται στη γενετική 
εφαρμοσμένη μηχανική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biotechnologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biotechnologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biotechnology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biotecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βιοτεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
